content: needle tip under both legs of the rem remain slipped st along the edge of the heel flap repeat repeat wrap the yarn around your needle kwise and round s round s pull through onto rh needle rs right side ws wrong side ©2018 lori wagner designs davenlori98@hotmail com pattern not to be reproduced reprinted sold or knit for sale page 2 socks instructions cuff cast-on 60 66 72 sts with a long tail cast on or elastic cast on of your choice and join for working in the round distributing stitches on needles as you prefer and being careful not to twist the sts mark the beginning of the round with a removable marker rnds 1-12 k1 tbl *p1 k2 tbl repeat from * until 2 sts rem p1 k1 tbl leg round 1 k to end of round round 2 k1 *p1 k2 repeat from * until 2 sts rem p1 k1 work rnds 1-2 36 times total or until desired length heel for 7 and 8 5 only set-up row 1 rs k30 -- 36 turn work set-up row 2 ws p30 -- 36 turn work heel flap is worked over these 30 -- 36 sts rearrange sts as you prefer on needles remaining 30 -- 36 sts will be worked later for instep for 7 75 only set-up row 1 rs k1 k2tog k30 turn work 1 st decrease set-up row 2 ws p32 turn work heel flap is worked over these 32 sts rearrange sts as you prefer on needles remaining 33 sts will be worked later for instep for all sizes work heel sts back and forth in row as follows row 1 rs *sl1 pwise wyb k1 repeat from * across row 2 ws *sl1 pwise wyf purl across repeat these 2 row 14 15 17 times more 30 32 36 row total 15 16 18 slipped selvedge sts turn heel work short row to shape heel as follows row 1 rs k17 18 20 ssk k1 turn work row 2 ws sl1 pwise wyf p5 p2tog p1 turn work row 3 sl1 pwise wyb k to 1 st before gap ssk 1 st from each side of gap k1 turn work row 4 sl1 pwise wyf purl to 1 st before gap p2tog 1 st from each side of gap p1 turn work repeat row 3 & 4 3 4 5 times more final rs row k to 1 st before gap ssk 1 st from each side of gap k1 0 0 final ws row p to 1 st before gap p2tog 1 st from each side of gap p1 0 0 ©2018 lori wagner designs davenlori98@hotmail com pattern not to be reproduced reprinted sold or knit for sale page 3 shape gussets note right and left gusset set up row need to be worked before starting the charts for the instep because pattern carries over into the gusset 1 st so that the diagonal stitch pattern flows out of the
